response.original_title: Charlotte Film Festival Shorts Programs: A CASE OF THE EVERYDAYS (Narrative Shorts #7)
response.overview: These narrative short films immerse you in worlds where emotion and perception collide, and the line between reality and illusion blurs. With unexpectedly shocking turns, striking visuals, and deeply human moments, each story offers a visceral, thought-provoking experience that resonates long after the final frame. Titles: 5:28 AM | Blood Boys | Sins of the Father | Masks | The Man Upstairs | DEMONBOY | Night Light | Thank You For Your Time
response.title: Charlotte Film Festival Shorts Programs: A CASE OF THE EVERYDAYS (Narrative Shorts #7)
